featured.text: I’m not sure exactly how much scholarship you’ll receive, but it will _____ cover your major expenses.
He sets aside a part of his salary for a scholarship fund for children from needy families.

definition.zh_def: 獎學金；學術研究的獎勵或資助
definition.en_def: A grant or payment made to support a student's education, awarded on the basis of academic or other achievements.
definition.example: She received a scholarship to study at her dream university.
